item.title: Raichur News: Tinthini Kanaka Gurupeeth Seer Dies at 49
item.description:
<![CDATA[Tinthini Kanaka Gurupeeth seer dies of heart attack
Born as Mohan Pradhan to Mahadevaiah and Jayamma at Kalamarahalli in Challakere taluk, Chitradurga district. the seer left his home at the age of 18 and embarked on a spiritual journey....]]>
